T02D3748:84a-4: bcom ldan 'das dzambha la la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3748:84a-5: mchod sbyin brgya pa me lha gdong bzhi dang //
T02D3748:84a-6: seng ge 'phrog byed nyin mor byed rnams kyis //
T02D3748:84a-7: zhabs gnyis la btud bcom ldan sdug bsngal pa //
T02D3748:84a-8: bdag la pad ltar yangs pa'i spyan ras gzigs ;
T02D3748:84a-9: / bcom ldan chab khyor gang gis mnyes 'gyur na //
T02D3748:84a-10: thugs rje mnga' ba gzhan gang lags pa gsungs //
T02D3748:84a-11: de phyir mchod pa bshams la mi rtsi zhing //
T02D3748:84a-12: khyod dang 'dra ba phal cher rnyed par dka' //
T02D3748:84a-13: brtse bas 'bad pa'i sgo nas btsal btsal nas //
T02D3748:84a-14: phongs par gyur pa bdag la bde mdzad na //
T02D3748:84a-15: kho bo mchi ma dag gis gdong spags pa //
T02D3748:84a-16: spyan sngar mchis kyang ci ste gzigs ma lags //
T02D3748:84a-17: ae ma'o rab tu rgyas pa thugs rje yi //
T02D3748:84a-18: gzhu mo mnga' ba khyod lta bzhugs gyur kyang //
T02D3748:84a-19: skye tshogs bzlog dka' sdug bsngal chom rkun gyi //
T02D3748:84a-20: ste yis rnam par 'joms par ji ltar lags //
T02D3748:84a-21: sems can sman slad nor phu rin po che //
T02D3748:84a-22: rnam pa sna tshogs dgung char 'bebs drag na //
T02D3748:84a-23: kho bo khyod nyid gcig pu'i mthar thug pa //
T02D3748:84a-24: ci ste thigs pa yang ni 'bebs ma lags //
T02D3748:84a-25: khyod bzhugs bzhin du me yis 'bar ba ltar //
T02D3748:84a-26: kho bo phongs pas shin tu cher bsreg na //
T02D3748:84a-27: khyod kyis lta zhig thugs rje 'jo ba'i ba //
T02D3748:84a-28: sa gsum khur du khur ba gang du thal //
T02D3748:84a-29: bum pa dpag bsam shing dang yid bzhin gyi //
T02D3748:84a-30: nor bu sems dpa' dang ldan ma lags pa //
T02D3748:84a-31: de dag gis kyang sems can phan bgyid na //
T02D3748:84b-0: thugs rje'i bdag @84b can bcom ldan smos ci 'tshal //
T02D3748:84b-1: gang zhig rmugs 'dzin chu yi dbang po zhes //
T02D3748:84b-2: skad cig kyang ni khyod kyi mtshan smos pa //
T02D3748:84b-3: de la padma'i 'byung gnas legs bzhin du //
T02D3748:84b-4: pad rgyas dpal ni 'jug par bgyid pa lags //
T02D3748:84b-5: de ltar bcom ldan srid 'joms khyod spyan sngar //
T02D3748:84b-6: cho nges btab pa'i bsod nams 'byam klas pa //
T02D3748:84b-7: gang yin de yis skye bo khyod bzhin du //
T02D3748:84b-8: mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'byin par shog /
T02D3748:84b-9: bcom ldan 'das rmugs 'dzin la bstod pa slob dpon
T02D3748:84b-10: chen po btsun ba zla bas mdzad pa rdzogs so
T02D3748:84b-12: / // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po mu ti ta shr'i dzny'a na'i zhal snga nas dang /
